Package game.network

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Message.Error
    Log an error if received for debug purposes.
    Message.Receivable
    Handles a received object from the server before deserialisation
    Message.Sendable
    Handles a sendable object before transmission to the server.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Message
    Class contains all types of message that can be sent or recieved between a client and the server
    Message.ClientClient
    Read data in, object sent from one client to hte other.
    Message.ClientClient.CCObject
    Object to send, send to output stream.
    Message.ClientServer
    Abstract class to represent the client.
    Message.ClientServer.BeginMM
    Send match making request
    Message.ClientServer.CancelMM
    Cancel match making request
    Message.ClientServer.RequestQuit
    Match making request did quit unexpectedly.
    Message.LocalError  
    Message.ServerClient
    All cases of message types that can be received or sent.
    Message.ServerClient.AckBeginMM
    Match making began on the server for this user - trying to find match.
    Message.ServerClient.AckCancelMM
    Match making cancelled for this user on the server.
    Message.ServerClient.AckRequestQuit
    A request to quit the game was sent from the other user.
    Message.ServerClient.FoundGame
    Found a match for a game for this user on the server.
    Message.ServerClient.NetworkError  
    Message.ServerClient.OpponentQuit
    Opponent quit the game - is processed so that this user knows they won.
    Message.ServerClient.StateError
    Some transaction of objects was unexpected and the games have diverged - state error.
    Protocol
    This class represents a connection to a server implementing the Sepr Server-Client communication protocol
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Protocol.State
    The states a connection can be in
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    Message.Receivable.ReceiveException  
    Message.Sendable.SendException
